faq.pageDescription: Find answers to common questions about our services
faq.formDescription: Can't find what you're looking for? Submit your question here.
faq.successMessage: Your question has been submitted successfully!
faq.errorMessage: There was an error submitting your question. Please try again.
faq.placeholder: Please describe your issue or question...

faqs.question: What is your return policy?
faqs.answer: We offer a 30-day return policy for all unused items in their original packaging.

faqs.question: How long does shipping take?
faqs.answer: Shipping typically takes 3-5 business days for domestic orders and 7-14 days for international orders.

faqs.question: Do you offer international shipping?
faqs.answer: Yes, we ship to most countries worldwide. Shipping costs and times may vary depending on the destination.

faqs.question: How can I track my order?
faqs.answer: Once your order ships, you will receive a tracking number via email that you can use to monitor your shipment status.

maps.title: Maps
maps.description: This is the maps page developed by Naver API
